channels.name: Skynet News
channels.description: The Skynet News channel provides the latest news, reports, and analysis from around the world.

channels.name: Skynet Drama
channels.description: The Skynet Drama channel showcases a range of classic and contemporary drama series and movies.

channels.name: Skynet Comedy
channels.description: The Skynet Comedy channel features hilarious sitcoms, stand-up comedy, and comedic movies.

channels.name: Skynet Cinema
channels.description: The Skynet Cinema channel offers a selection of acclaimed films from various genres.

channels.name: Skynet Thriller
channels.description: The Skynet Thriller channel broadcasts suspenseful and exciting thriller films.

channels.name: Skynet Reality
channels.description: The Skynet Reality channel airs popular reality TV shows, ranging from cooking competitions to talent hunts.

channels.name: Skynet Sports
channels.description: The Skynet Sports channel covers a variety of sports events, news, and documentaries.

programmes.title: Morning News
programmes.description: Latest updates from around the world.

programmes.title: Afternoon News
programmes.description: Updates on global events.

programmes.title: Evening News
programmes.description: News wrap-up of the day's events.

programmes.title: Late Night News
programmes.description: News and updates into the night.

programmes.title: Breaking Bad
programmes.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturing drug dealer.

programmes.title: Game of Thrones
programmes.description: Epic fantasy drama based on George R. R. Martin's novel series.

location.name: Belfast, Northern Ireland
location.relationship: A large portion of Game of Thrones was filmed in Northern Ireland, including scenes featuring Winterfell, the Iron Islands, and more.

programmes.title: The Crown
programmes.description: Chronicles the reign of Queen Elizabeth II.

programmes.title: The Walking Dead
programmes.description: Post-apocalyptic horror television series based on the comic book.

location.name: Atlanta, Georgia, USA
location.relationship: The Walking Dead begins in Atlanta, and the city serves as a key location in the early seasons of the show.

programmes.title: The Sopranos
programmes.description: New Jersey mob boss, Tony Soprano, deals with personal and professional issues.

programmes.title: The Wire
programmes.description: Baltimore drug scene, seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

programmes.title: Downton Abbey
programmes.description: A chronicle of the lives of the British aristocratic Crawley family.

programmes.title: Peaky Blinders
programmes.description: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps.

programmes.title: The Office
programmes.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

programmes.title: Parks and Recreation
programmes.description: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

programmes.title: Friends
programmes.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

location.name: New York, New York, USA
location.relationship: New York is the backdrop of Friends, where the characters live and work. Central Perk, their favorite coffee shop, and their apartments have become iconic settings.

programmes.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programmes.description: Comedy series following the detectives of Brooklyn's 99th Precinct.

programmes.title: The Simpsons
programmes.description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

location.name: Springfield, Oregon, USA
location.relationship: The Simpson family lives in the town of Springfield. While the exact state is intentionally left ambiguous in the show, Springfield is the center of countless adventures in the series.

programmes.title: The Big Bang Theory
programmes.description: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

programmes.title: The Simpsons
programmes.description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

location.name: Springfield, Oregon, USA
location.relationship: The Simpson family lives in the town of Springfield. While the exact state is intentionally left ambiguous in the show, Springfield is the center of countless adventures in the series.

programmes.title: Arrested Development
programmes.description: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.

programmes.title: Jaws
programmes.description: A local sheriff, a marine biologist and an old seafarer team up to hunt down a great white shark wrecking havoc in a beach resort.

programmes.title: Jurassic Park
programmes.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

programmes.title: The Sound of Music
programmes.description: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

location.name: Salzburg, Austria
location.relationship: Salzburg is where the real Von Trapp family lived, and many scenes of the film were shot at iconic locations throughout the city.

programmes.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programmes.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

programmes.title: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
programmes.description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star.

location.name: Redwood National and State Parks, California, USA
location.relationship: The Battle of Endor scenes, where the Rebel Alliance fights against the Galactic Empire on the forest moon of Endor, were filmed in the Redwoods of California.

programmes.title: Seven
programmes.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

programmes.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programmes.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

programmes.title: The Shining
programmes.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

location.name: Estes Park, Colorado, USA
location.relationship: The Overlook Hotel in The Shining is inspired by The Stanley Hotel in Estes Park, which author Stephen King visited and found eerie.

programmes.title: Fight Club
programmes.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

programmes.title: The Beach
programmes.description: Vicenarian Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss.

location.name: Phi Phi Islands, Thailand
location.relationship: The idyllic beach scenes from The Beach were filmed on the Phi Phi Islands in Thailand, contributing to the film's allure and the islands' subsequent tourist boom.

programmes.title: Gone Girl
programmes.description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

programmes.title: MasterChef
programmes.description: Amateur chefs compete in this reality cooking competition, judged by world-renowned chefs.

programmes.title: The Amazing Race
programmes.description: Teams of two people race around the world in competition with other teams.

programmes.title: Love Island
programmes.description: A dating show where singles live in a villa and compete for love and money.

location.name: Mallorca, Spain
location.relationship: Love Island is typically filmed in a villa in Mallorca, where the contestants live, date, and compete for the prize.

programmes.title: Survivor
programmes.description: Contestants are stranded on a remote island and must outwit, outlast and outplay each other for the title of Sole Survivor.

programmes.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.description: An up-close look at the lives of wealthy and famous women in Beverly Hills.

programmes.title: Big Brother
programmes.description: Contestants live together in a house and are filmed 24/7, with weekly evictions deciding the winner.

programmes.title: The Bachelor
programmes.description: A single bachelor dates multiple women over several weeks, narrowing them down in hopes of finding his true love.

programmes.title: Dancing With the Stars
programmes.description: Celebrities partner up with professional dancers and compete in a dance competition.

programmes.title: Hell's Kitchen
programmes.description: Aspiring chefs brave Chef Gordon Ramsay and his fiery command of the kitchen in an intense culinary academy.

programmes.title: America's Got Talent
programmes.description: Performers of all kinds showcase their talent and compete against each other for a chance to win a cash prize.

programmes.title: The Voice
programmes.description: Talented singers compete in blind auditions for a chance to be mentored by industry professionals and win a recording contract.

programmes.title: SportsCenter
programmes.description: Catch up on the biggest stories from the world of sports in this comprehensive roundup.

programmes.title: 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup Qualifiers
programmes.description: Watch teams from across the globe compete for a spot in the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup.

programmes.title: The Wimbledon Finals: A Look Back
programmes.description: A detailed look at some of the most thrilling finals in the history of the Wimbledon Championships.

programmes.title: NBA: The Greatest Games
programmes.description: Revisit some of the most memorable games in the history of the NBA.

programmes.title: The Open Championship Highlights
programmes.description: Highlights from the latest Open Championship, one of the most prestigious tournaments in golf.

programmes.title: Sports Documentaries: The Rise and Fall of Lance Armstrong
programmes.description: A deep dive into the rise and fall of Lance Armstrong, a seven-time Tour de France winner who was later banned for life for doping.

programmes.title: Live: Major League Baseball
programmes.description: Live coverage of today's Major League Baseball game.
